channel.title: Deminthium QuickPrayers

item.title: Deminthium QuickPrayers
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

Can some one tell me or help me finish the quickprayers system for deminthium it was commented out in actionbuttonhandler and i decommented it so its clickable but the glitch is when their enabled when you reach 0 prayer it continues to work and dosent turn them off even with 0 prayer? Can anyone help please

where else would it be handled?
would this be it?

case 749: switch (packet.getOpcode()) { case 6: player.getPrayer().switchQuickPrayers(); player.sendMessage("Quick prayers are disabled for now."); break; case 13: player.getPrayer().switchSettingQuickPrayer(); player.sendMessage("Quick prayers are disabled for now."); break; } break;

case 43: player.getPrayer().setQuickPrayers(); break; default: }

Read full topic
